scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,frontend -c green,cyan "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: bun run build:frontend && bun run build:server
scripts.postbuild: bunx rimraf build/client && bunx mkdirp build/client && bunx cp -r frontend/dist/* build/client/ && cp server/.env build/.env
scripts.lint: bun run lint --filter=server && bun run lint --filter=frontend
scripts.update:all: bun update --latest && cd server && bun update --latest && cd ../frontend && bun update --latest
